name: Unstaball
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 49 with the theme UNSTABLE.

Watch out for the floor tiles! Keep jumping around and destroy all the turrets before they make you fall off the ground. Each tile will be exploding after you touch it twice!

The game revolves around a simple idea that the floor tiles are unstable and keep exploding after you touch it twice or touch it after getting hit by a turret. So you have to avoid falling off the arena and kill all the turrets.

Controls:

WASD and Space

Team:

Elvis L - Programming, Game Design, Level Design

Ivan G - Visual Effects, Game Design, Sound Design
